description._content:
Back row (from left to right): Hendrik Meesman (the Netherlands), John Paget (Switzerland/England), ??? (Scotland), Luca Ferrari (Italy), ??? (England), Andy Shingler (England); front row: Adam Markin (England), ??? (England), Neil Hutchinson (England), John Nolan (England, captain), Martin ??? (USA). Picture taken at the New Malden Sports Ground.
Many thanks to John  Paget (BSc Econ 1986) for sending us this photo:
'The LSE First Team was one of the stronger teams in the University of London league. The team was very international, with players from the United Kingdom, Europe (the Netherlands, Switzerland and Italy) and North America. John Nolan, a Liverpudlian, was a strong and an inspirational captain!' 

Imagelibrary/1338
